item.title: Dictation in the wild
item.dc:creator: agiletortoise
item.description:
Depends on what you are trying to grab. Dictation on watchOS is pretty limited and best for grabbing short snippets up to about 30-40 seconds. It will timeout and throw away the dictation results if the watch goes to sleep - so you have to hold your wrist up and talk to it.

If you envisioning just dictating a long memo while taking a mile hike, I would say the answer is no.

These are not Drafts limitation, but watchOS level.
